column1: "description": "This table (Annexure 14.2 to the base Table) provides Sectoral Coal Demand/Off-take for Annual Plan (2012\u201313). It gives category-wise and sector-wise details for the years 2006 to 2013 and projections for the year 2016-17. "
"title": "Download XLS for Sectoral Coal Demand/Off-take for Annual Plan (2012\u201313)"
